nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.items

Interface Item

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Collectable, Entity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Block, BugEntity, ExitLock, Harmful, Key, Player, Remedy, Treasure

    public interface Item
    State the properties of an object which could occupy a tile.
     

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Maze.SpecialEvent applyAction(Entity entity)
      Apply the action linked with this item.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get unique identifier for this collectable item.
      default boolean hasAction()
      Check if this item is linked with an action.
      boolean isAccessible(Entity entity)
      Identify whether this item can allow the player to move into it.
      default boolean isCollectable()
      Check if this item can be added to the player inventory.
      default Item unmodifiableItem(Item item)
      Implements Protection Proxy using DynamicProxy.

    • Method Detail

      • isAccessible

        boolean isAccessible(Entity entity)
        Identify whether this item can allow the player to move into it. When that occurs the item is removed from tile
        Parameters:
        entity - who is trying to access this tile
        Returns:
        whether this item a player to access it's tile

      • isCollectable

        default boolean isCollectable()
        Check if this item can be added to the player inventory. By default items can't be collected
        Returns:
        whether this item can be picked up by the player

      • hasAction

        default boolean hasAction()
        Check if this item is linked with an action. By default items do not have an action
        Returns:
        whether this item has an associated

      • applyAction

        default Maze.SpecialEvent applyAction(Entity entity)
        Apply the action linked with this item. This might affects who interacts with this item. This method should be overridden whenever hasAction is overridden
        Parameters:
        entity - who is interacting with this item
        Returns:
        This method return a special event or null depending by what happens

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Get unique identifier for this collectable item. Each concrete type should return a different value.
        Returns:
        the sequence of characters identifying this collectable item

      • unmodifiableItem

        default Item unmodifiableItem(Item item)
        Implements Protection Proxy using DynamicProxy. to prevent item modifications
        Parameters:
        item - the original item to be protected
        Returns:
        the original Item which however can't be modified
